siteMetadata.siteName: WPCampus: Where WordPress meets higher education

wordpressPage.title: Membership
wordpressPage.content:
A “member” of WPCampus is anyone who actively participates in, or contributes to our organization, and supports our mission to advance and support Higher Education.

Membership is not limited to those who work in Higher Ed as we do not believe you have to be in Higher Education to bring value to our community.

If supporting our mission, and interacting with helpful folks using WordPress in Higher Education, is something you’re interested in, we’d love for you to join the fun.

Become a member

Use the following form to register as a member (will create a user account) and join our Slack workspace, where the majority of WPCampus conversations and interactions take place.

If you have already used this form to register a user account and are looking to join Slack: login to your profile

If you experience any issues, please let us know.
